title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Terrorist Targets in South Lebanon: A Detailed Account”

content.rendered:
IDF spokesperson:

The IDF attacked terrorist targets in South Lebanon, including Hezbollah’s military buildings where terrorists operated alongside another terrorist infrastructure.

A short time ago, Air Force fighter jets attacked the terrorist infrastructure of the Hezbollah organization in southern Lebanon.

Earlier today, two military buildings were attacked in the areas of Erez and Al-Adiasa, where the organization’s terrorists operated.

Following alerts in the north of the country, about 35 launches were identified that crossed from Lebanese territory to En Zitim area, no casualties. IDF forces attacked the source of the fire.

Attached is documentation of the attack: https://bit.ly/49HBYkc
